snippet: While Anthony has been on a scoring binge in the playoffs, the popular narrative around the team has been that the most prudent approach is to keep the ball in his hands.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column notes that New York Knicks star forward Carmelo Anthony has been on a scoring binge as the regular season draws to a close; asserts, however, that Anthony alone cannot advance the Knicks very far if they make the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: While Anthony has been on a scoring binge in the playoffs, the popular narrative around the team has been that the most prudent approach is to keep the ball in his hands.

headline.seo: Letting Anthony Go It Alone May Not Lead Knicks Anywhere
headline.main: Letting Carmelo Anthony Go It Alone May Not Help Knicks
headline.print_headline: In the Playoffs, Going It Alone May Not Lead Anywhere
